full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/24/2023 Form G-135a Agency Name Check Office (Rev. 10-1-65) LOS UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE File No. Immigration and Naturalization Service 559853 TC-ECM DIRECTOR, FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION, Date DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, March 15, 1966 Washington, D. C. 20537 Attention: IDENTIFICATION DIVISION gs W. Please furnish a copy of any criminal record shown in the fingerprint records of your Bureau concerning the following person.
